LABEL: 0x520
STRING: At Nana's request, we decided to have a sleepover at my house today.

LABEL: 0x587
STRING: Nana first went back to her home, prepared the stuff for sleeping over, and then visited my house again, dressed in cute casual clothes.

LABEL: 0x614
STRING: Tomorrow is Saturday and school is not in session, so I'll be able to relax.

LABEL: 0x67B
STRING: I don't mind at all. As long as Nana can feel safe and relaxed.

LABEL: 0x6E0
STRING: She seemed to have nightmares every night and has become afraid to sleep alone.

LABEL: 0x745
STRING: She decided to take a break from her part-time job for a while because she didn't know what Saiko would do.

LABEL: 0x7BC
STRING: That strong-willed Nana had been reduced to this pitiful, weak state.

LABEL: 0x81D
STRING: At least while she's at my home, I want to make sure she has a good time.

LABEL: 0x882
STRING: With that in mind, I'm staying up late with her.

LABEL: 0x989
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x997
STRING: "Yay〜!! I won against Metarou!"

LABEL: 0xA79
STRING: Nana held up her controller and pumped her fist in triumph.

LABEL: 0xAE2
STRING: We're playing a competitive game of tag right now.

LABEL: 0xB43
STRING: One person becomes a demon and tries to annihilate the four survivors.

LABEL: 0xBAA
STRING: The survivors try to escape from the demon and win if they can cooperate and escape from the exit.

LABEL: 0xC0D
STRING: It's great to play co-op with your friends, but it's also very exciting to play against each other.

LABEL: 0xD28
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0xD36
STRING: "Metarou, you died so quickly〜 there's no challenge at all."

LABEL: 0xECF
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0xEDD
STRING: "Okay, now it's your turn to be the demon! And my turn to run away."

LABEL: 0x1074
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x1082
STRING: "...Hey, did you run out of candy already?"

LABEL: 0x120D
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x121B
STRING: "I want to play while eating candy〜 ...Hey Metarou, go to the convenience store and get some."

LABEL: 0x132B
STRING: She has a point. There's nothing like a good game paired with some sweet candy.

LABEL: 0x139A
STRING: But look at the time. It's already 2am...!

LABEL: 0x13FD
STRING: It's such a pain to go out shopping at this hour.

LABEL: 0x1502
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x1510
STRING: "Eehhh〜〜 Metarou... pretty please..."

LABEL: 0x168F
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x169D
STRING: "Ah, I know. We'll go buy it together then!"

LABEL: 0x1792
STRING: Even though I don't believe that stalker woman is still out and about at this time of night, I'm worried about letting Nana go out alone.

LABEL: 0x181F
STRING: If it comes down to it, I'll be there for her.

LABEL: 0x1872
STRING: So I decided to accompany her on her trip to the convenience store.

LABEL: 0x1A49
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x1A57
STRING: "Jeez, Metarou, didn't you buy too much?"

LABEL: 0x1B43
STRING: Nana was dumbfounded, pointing at my heavily-laden shopping bag.

LABEL: 0x1BA4
STRING: Whenever I go to a convenience store, I always end up buying more than expected.

LABEL: 0x1C13
STRING: I mean, not only are there sweets, but you'll also get cravings for bread, ice cream, and snacks.

LABEL: 0x1D42
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x1D50
STRING: "You're going to properly eat all of that, aren't you?"

LABEL: 0x1E3E
STRING: Despite her exasperation, Nana gave me a bright smile.

LABEL: 0x1E9F
STRING: Hoh... At one point, I wondered if she would really feel better during this sleepover...

LABEL: 0x1EF6
STRING: But I guess the sleepover is really helping her take those things off her mind.

LABEL: 0x1FF7
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x2005
STRING: "Sigh. If I marry Metarou, I'll have a hard time because you spend so much money."

LABEL: 0x219E
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x21AC
STRING: "We might end up together in the future, so you should give some thought to your spending..."

LABEL: 0x2361
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x2455
STRING: Nana suddenly stopped, her eyes flung open and was speechless.

LABEL: 0x24C2
STRING: In front of our field of vision was...

LABEL: 0x25D4
STRING: ...Saiko. Saiko was here.

LABEL: 0x2617
STRING: How did you end up here? Don't tell me, you were hiding out near my house?

LABEL: 0x268A
STRING: Saiko's eyes remained vacant, as she quickly approached us.

LABEL: 0x26F3
STRING: Wait, what are you trying to pull off now...!?

LABEL: 0x2746
STRING: If you try anything weird, I won't let you off the hook...!!

LABEL: 0x2845
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x2853
STRING: "Sa-Saiko...chan... why are you here?"

LABEL: 0x29D7
STRING: Saiko

LABEL: 0x29E5
STRING: "Nana-senpai, I texted you, but why are you ignoring me?"

LABEL: 0x2B7E
STRING: Saiko

LABEL: 0x2B8C
STRING: "...Why did you take the day off from work?"

LABEL: 0x2D11
STRING: Saiko

LABEL: 0x2D1F
STRING: "Are you feeling unwell? Or are you and that man..."

LABEL: 0x2EAC
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x2EBA
STRING: "Stop it already!!! Stop following me! Just leave me alone already!"

LIST.STRING: You got business with Nana, you go through me.
If I talk with her, she'll understand

LABEL: 0x3063
STRING: Violence won't solve anything.

LABEL: 0x30A6
STRING: The other party is human, so if you talk to them, they'll understand, right?

LABEL: 0x3105
STRING: I stood in front of her in silence.

LABEL: 0x31F6
STRING: Saiko

LABEL: 0x3204
STRING: "What are you up to...?"

LABEL: 0x32DF
STRING: I looked her in the eye and told her how I feel.

LABEL: 0x332E
STRING: That Nana is an important person to me.

LABEL: 0x3379
STRING: That I love her more than anything in the world.

LABEL: 0x3468
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x3476
STRING: "Me-Metarou..."

LABEL: 0x3548
STRING: And that I don't want to see my girlfriend hurt like that...

LABEL: 0x35A3
STRING: If we're going to be together in the future, I want to let her know that I respect her feelings.

LABEL: 0x3614
STRING: I told the truth as it is, never looking away until the end.

LABEL: 0x36A0
STRING: When I had finished saying all that I had to say, she just said, "Okay," and left the place.

LABEL: 0x37DD
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x37EB
STRING: "Hey... D-Did... she understand... us?"

LABEL: 0x38DF
STRING: I don't know if she really understood me or not.

LABEL: 0x393A
STRING: But at least we should be able to relax for tonight.

LABEL: 0x3991
STRING: The problem is solved now, she can stop stalking her now... hopefully.

LABEL: 0x3A06
STRING: Let's believe in her...

LABEL: 0x3B4B
STRING: On the usual route to school.

LABEL: 0x3B88
STRING: I'm on my way to school alone, when a girl's shadow approaches me.

LABEL: 0x3C92
STRING: Saiko

LABEL: 0x3CA0
STRING: "Senpaaai!"

LABEL: 0x3D6B
STRING: It was Saiko.

LABEL: 0x3E4C
STRING: Saiko

LABEL: 0x3E5A
STRING: "I'm sorry about the other day, nanodesu!"

LABEL: 0x3F37
STRING: She bowed her head cutely, in a way that was unimaginable from her previous gloomy atmosphere.

LABEL: 0x4052
STRING: Saiko

LABEL: 0x4060
STRING: "It seems that I've frightened Nana-senpai, and caused trouble to her, right?"

LABEL: 0x4209
STRING: Saiko

LABEL: 0x4217
STRING: "Are you mad at me, Nana-senpai...? Do you hate me now?"

LABEL: 0x431C
STRING: ─Why, she's become bright and lively all of a sudden.

LABEL: 0x437B
STRING: I knew she was a girl who'll understand after a good talking to.

LABEL: 0x43D4
STRING: If I could give her a chance to change, then maybe what I did wasn't a wasted effort after all.

LABEL: 0x445D
STRING: In fact, I feel like I've done something really good.

LABEL: 0x4573
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x4581
STRING: "Sa-Saiko-chan...?"

LABEL: 0x4655
STRING: As soon as she saw Saiko, Nana had a tense expression on her face.

LABEL: 0x46B6
STRING: It's not hard to see why, since until recently she had experienced so much fear and horror.

LABEL: 0x47CD
STRING: Saiko

LABEL: 0x47DB
STRING: "Nana-senpai, I'm sorry about the other day!"

LABEL: 0x48C6
STRING: Saiko bowed her head just like before.

LABEL: 0x49C1
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x4B39
STRING: Saiko

LABEL: 0x4B47
STRING: "I really regret... that I frightened Nana-senpai."

LABEL: 0x4CEA
STRING: Saiko

LABEL: 0x4CF8
STRING: "I've also surprised Metarou-senpai a lot... I'm really a bad girl, nanodesu..."

LABEL: 0x4EAF
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x4EBD
STRING: "That's... that's not true at all! Cheer up! Saiko-chan's not a bad girl at all!"

LABEL: 0x5069
STRING: Saiko

LABEL: 0x5077
STRING: "Nana...senpai..."

LABEL: 0x51E4
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x51F2
STRING: "Yeah! I don't mind at all. It's alright now, so you don't need to feel down, Saiko-chan. Okay?"

LABEL: 0x53A8
STRING: Saiko

LABEL: 0x53B6
STRING: "Sniff... Nana-senpai, thank you very much!!"

LABEL: 0x5545
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x5553
STRING: "I'm sorry too. It seems I've misunderstood you, Saiko-chan... you're actually such a good girl."

LABEL: 0x5704
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x5712
STRING: "I love you, Saiko-chan. Let's always be friends from now on."

LABEL: 0x58AE
STRING: Saiko

LABEL: 0x58BC
STRING: "Yes! Of course, nanodesu!"

LABEL: 0x5993
STRING: Saiko and Nana shook hands. Both seemed refreshed.

LABEL: 0x59F4
STRING: Looks like you two have made up. Good, good...

LABEL: 0x5A53
STRING: I was relieved to see them looking so happy.

LABEL: 0x5B52
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x5B60
STRING: "I know! This Sunday Metarou, Yukimaru, and I are having a takoyaki party. If you want, you can come too!"

LABEL: 0x5D30
STRING: Saiko

LABEL: 0x5D3E
STRING: "Really? Ta-takoyaki party... It's an honour! Nana-senpai, I... I'm... so happy I could cry, nanodesu...!"

LABEL: 0x5F0F
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x5F1D
STRING: "Ahahaha! You're exaggerating. If that's what you want, I'll invite you over as much as you want."

LABEL: 0x60CF
STRING: Saiko

LABEL: 0x60DD
STRING: "I'm now properly friends with Nana-senpai..."

LABEL: 0x6266
STRING: Saiko

LABEL: 0x63E3
STRING: Saiko

LABEL: 0x63F1
STRING: "I'm truly happy, nanodesu."

LABEL: 0x65C4
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x661F
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x662D
STRING: "Ugh... Aa... cough..."

LABEL: 0x6685
STRING: Saiko

LABEL: 0x6693
STRING: "Ufufu, I've caught you, Nana-senpai... nanodesu."

LABEL: 0x6704
STRING: Saiko

LABEL: 0x6712
STRING: "Heehee.... ufufu, ahahahaha!"

LABEL: 0x6775
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x6783
STRING: "Saiko...cha... Wh...y...?"

LABEL: 0x67EF
STRING: Saiko

LABEL: 0x67FD
STRING: "Nana-senpai, I've always admired you."

LABEL: 0x6874
STRING: Saiko

LABEL: 0x6882
STRING: "From today, I'll become Nana-senpai for you. ...So please be at ease."

LABEL: 0x6915
STRING: Saiko

LABEL: 0x6923
STRING: "Even when you're gone... I'll be there in your place."

LABEL: 0x6992
STRING: Saiko

LABEL: 0x69A0
STRING: "So just rest easy and go back to sleep."

LABEL: Custom3
STRING: BAD END「Hope」

LABEL: 0x6C1E
STRING: If you try to touch my precious Nana... I won't forgive you.

LABEL: 0x6C83
STRING: Determined to do so, I stood directly in front of Saiko .

LABEL: 0x6D80
STRING: Saiko

LABEL: 0x6D8E
STRING: "...Nana...senpai."

LABEL: 0x6E5F
STRING: Saiko's eyes, always cold and murky, wavered and then opened wide.

LABEL: 0x6F66
STRING: Saiko

LABEL: 0x6F74
STRING: "You'd definitely be better off with me than with a guy like that..."

LABEL: 0x7109
STRING: Saiko

LABEL: 0x7117
STRING: "I'm really disappointed in you, nanodesu..."

LABEL: 0x7424
STRING: Saiko

LABEL: 0x7469
STRING: At that moment, red droplets flew in the air.

LABEL: 0x74B2
STRING: I couldn't believe my eyes.

LABEL: 0x74F9
STRING: An unbelievable scene happened right in front of my eyes─

LABEL: 0x754E
STRING: Saiko's stomach had been stabbed deeply, by a large pair of scissors.

LABEL: 0x75C3
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x763B
STRING: ─It was Nana who has holding the handles.

LABEL: 0x76A4
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x76B2
STRING: "I... I finally killed her...!!"

LABEL: 0x7700
STRING: Why did this have to happen...?

LABEL: 0x7757
STRING: Why did Nana have to kill Saiko...

LABEL: 0x77C4
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x77D2
STRING: "Yay! Alright!!! Aha, kyahaha! Hahahahahaha!!!!"

LABEL: 0x7844
STRING: Nana made some strange noises as if she was crazy, and then she hugged me.

LABEL: 0x78AF
STRING: Nana...

LABEL: 0x78E4
STRING: Are you saying that you were so terrified that you've finally broke down?

LABEL: 0x794D
STRING: You don't have to be afraid anymore... I'll be with you forever and ever.

LABEL: 0x79C0
STRING: Hey... isn't that right? Please tell me that's right...

LABEL: 0x7BD9
STRING: A dull thud runs through my body.

LABEL: 0x7C1C
STRING: A large pair of scissors is pulled out of my stomach with great force.

LABEL: 0x7C7B
STRING: Ah...Aaaah.

LABEL: 0x7CB4
STRING: Please tell me this isn't true... Nana...

LABEL: 0x7D0D
STRING: Na...na...

LABEL: 0x7DBA
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x7DC8
STRING: "Everyone, everyone, everyone is my enemy...!! You're all trying to trick me!"

LABEL: 0x7E57
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x7E65
STRING: "I can't believe... anyone or anything... anymore."

LABEL: 0x7F84
STRING: Saiko

LABEL: 0x7F92
STRING: "Nana...sen...pai..."

LABEL: 0x7FD9
STRING: A lot of blood is coming out of my stomach.

LABEL: 0x8040
STRING: Saiko

LABEL: 0x804E
STRING: "I'm... glad..."

LABEL: 0x808F
STRING: I feel my blood draining out and my temperature getting lower and lower.

LABEL: 0x80F6
STRING: I think I'm... going to die soon.

LABEL: 0x8143
STRING: I know how it ends, so there's nothing to be afraid of, nothing to be scared of.

LABEL: 0x81CA
STRING: Saiko

LABEL: 0x81D8
STRING: "It's... cold."

LABEL: 0x8217
STRING: Nana-senpai stabbed me. Killed me. She did it... for me.

LABEL: 0x827C
STRING: I'm glad.

LABEL: 0x82C5
STRING: Saiko

LABEL: 0x82D3
STRING: "To be killed by you it's my... true desire. I'm so happy..."

LABEL: 0x8340
STRING: Because I've always wanted to disappear...

LABEL: 0x838B
STRING: Because no matter how hard I tried, I couldn't disappear...

LABEL: 0x83E4
STRING: It's like I finally got my wish fulfilled.

LABEL: 0x8499
STRING: Saiko

LABEL: 0x84A7
STRING: Don't worry... everything's finished now, Onee-chan.

LABEL: 0x8506
STRING: On the other side, there's someone I'd like to meet...

LABEL: 0x8559
STRING: Someone who's been waiting for me to come home for years and years...

LABEL: 0x85CE
STRING: Saiko

LABEL: 0x85DC
STRING: "Good night, Onee-chan..."

LABEL: 0x87A8
STRING: My name is Saika.

LABEL: 0x87F3
STRING: I've left my parents' home and now I'm living on my own, working as a beautician.

LABEL: 0x885E
STRING: Not to toot my own horn, but I'm now quite a well-known stylist in this area.

LABEL: 0x88D5
STRING: Sometimes I'm assigned to a famous celebrity or some other VIP.

LABEL: 0x8938
STRING: It's been my dream since I was a little girl to become a beautician and style people's hair.

LABEL: 0x89A9
STRING: I worked part-time to save up for my tuition at a vocational school, and after a lot of hard work, I finally achieved my dream.

LABEL: 0x8A16
STRING: I'm proud of myself now, because I made my dream come true of my own free will, despite my parents' opposition.

LABEL: 0x8A99
STRING: But I've never told anyone about it.

LABEL: 0x8AFE
STRING: Because...

LABEL: 0x8B35
STRING: Talking to someone won't change anything, will it?

LABEL: 0x8B90
STRING: Besides, you never know what kind of drawback you might suffer.

LABEL: 0x8BE9
STRING: So I won't brag about it to anyone or share it with any of my friends.

LABEL: 0x8C50
STRING: If they ask me what I do, I tell them I'm a hairdresser, and that's it.

LABEL: 0x8CC1
STRING: I just wanted to be who I was when I met my family and friends.

LABEL: 0x8D2C
STRING: My personal life and my professional life are two different things, so I had to draw a line between the two in my mind.

LABEL: 0x8DA5
STRING: It would be exhausting to be a "famous stylist" all the time.

LABEL: 0x8E0A
STRING: The only people who know who I am are in my family: my mother and my sister, Saiko.

LABEL: 0x8E79
STRING: My father hasn't been in contact with us since the divorce.

LABEL: 0x8ECC
STRING: My mother raised us by herself... So I thought I should tell her what I did for a living.

LABEL: 0x8F5F
STRING: But I didn't think at the time that it would be something that would bring me crashing down on my feet.

LABEL: 0x903C
STRING: Friend

LABEL: 0x904A
STRING: "Today's bill was quite a bit〜 Saika, why don't you treat me!"

LABEL: 0x90BB
STRING: Saika

LABEL: 0x90C9
STRING: "No way. what are you talking about, we've always split the bill."

LABEL: 0x9139
STRING: I hadn't had a drink with my best friend in a few years.

LABEL: 0x9182
STRING: When I came back to my hometown after a long absence, I heard unbelievable words from her mouth.

LABEL: 0x9211
STRING: Friend

LABEL: 0x921F
STRING: "But Saika, I heard that you're making a lot of money, right?"

LABEL: 0x9292
STRING: Saika

LABEL: 0x92DE
STRING: My heart skipped a beat.

LABEL: 0x9321
STRING: Because I've never said a word to her about that.

LABEL: 0x9394
STRING: Friend

LABEL: 0x93A2
STRING: "You've got some spare change, right? I know you do."

LABEL: 0x9408
STRING: A bad feeling comes over me.

LABEL: 0x944F
STRING: ...What's this?

LABEL: 0x9490
STRING: Why are you saying this?

LABEL: 0x94F5
STRING: What's a best friend to you anyway? An ATM?

LABEL: 0x9566
STRING: Saika

LABEL: 0x9574
STRING: "What are you... talking about? I never said a word about that, did I?"

LABEL: 0x95F5
STRING: Friend

LABEL: 0x9603
STRING: "Your mother told me all about you, that you're a famous stylist, right?"

LABEL: 0x9694
STRING: Friend

LABEL: 0x96A2
STRING: "I heard you're making a lot of money. So why not a little?"

LABEL: 0x971C
STRING: I felt nauseous when I'm bombarded with these selfish requests.

LABEL: 0x977F
STRING: ...Oh, let's say I did earn it. Assuming she was telling the truth, why should I have to do it?

LABEL: 0x985C
STRING: It was just the right timing because it was Obon holiday and I was going home.

LABEL: 0x98C3
STRING: I wasn't really planning on going home, though.

LABEL: 0x991A
STRING: I was just going to have a drink with my best friend, but I had no choice...

LABEL: 0x9979
STRING: When I arrived at my parents' house, I questioned her with a serious expression.

LABEL: 0x99EC
STRING: Mom

LABEL: 0x99FE
STRING: "Ah, Saika, what are you up to these days? That's what's everyone's talking about lately, so I need to know how to answer them."

LABEL: 0x9A8A
STRING: From the way she spoke, she seemed to be saying, "So, it's not my fault."

LABEL: 0x9AF5
STRING: My mother has always justified herself like this.

LABEL: 0x9B52
STRING: Women like her protect themselves by changing the subject and saying it's not their fault.

LABEL: 0x9BC7
STRING: If someone asked my mother, she'd definitely say "My daughter is a famous stylist, her name is *****, she works with celebrities and makes a lot of money."

LABEL: 0x9C94
STRING: ─So everything was leaked, everyone in my hometown knows it by now.

LABEL: 0x9CF5
STRING: The secret I've kept all these years was blurted out so easily.

LABEL: 0x9D72
STRING: Saika

LABEL: 0x9D80
STRING: "Don't say any more than you have to."

LABEL: 0x9DE9
STRING: Saika

LABEL: 0x9DF7
STRING: "I don't like it when people find out about me, so don't tell anyone about it... Otherwise something like that'll happen again."

LABEL: 0x9EA0
STRING: Mom

LABEL: 0x9EB2
STRING: "Yes, yes, I'll be careful."

LABEL: 0x9F08
STRING: She doesn't seem to have reflected on her actions.

LABEL: 0x9F4F
STRING: That's the only way I could see it.

LABEL: 0x9F98
STRING: Why must I go through the trouble telling her in no uncertain terms, not to say such things.

LABEL: 0xA00D
STRING: She's lived twice as long as I have and can't even tell the difference between what's okay to say and what's not?

LABEL: 0xA0E6
STRING: Mom

LABEL: 0xA0F8
STRING: "Listen, Saika-chan. This is a story from when you and Saiko were still small."

LABEL: 0xA185
STRING: Mom

LABEL: 0xA197
STRING: "You know, when I was dating the man who's now my husband, there was a time when he was having money problems."

LABEL: 0xA222
STRING: Mom

LABEL: 0xA234
STRING: "So I loaned him 600 thousand yen to buy a car."

LABEL: 0xA2AB
STRING: Mom

LABEL: 0xA2BD
STRING: "And he says he still hasn't forgotten what I did for him〜 even though it was years ago."

LABEL: 0xA354
STRING: Mom

LABEL: 0xA366
STRING: "I'm really loved〜 don't you think so, Saika?

LABEL: 0xA3E7
STRING: Saika

LABEL: 0xA3F5
STRING: "You know... when you were dating your boyfriend, I was still living in this house, right?

LABEL: 0xA480
STRING: Saika

LABEL: 0xA48E
STRING: "Didn't you say that as a single mother, you were having a hard time finding money?"

LABEL: 0xA50F
STRING: Saika

LABEL: 0xA51D
STRING: "So you're saying that you've been paying off some guy while leaving me and my sister to fend for ourselves?"

LABEL: 0xA5B8
STRING: Saika

LABEL: 0xA5C6
STRING: "It's crazy to give a bunch of money to someone you're not even married to..."

LABEL: 0xA64D
STRING: Saika

LABEL: 0xA65B
STRING: "Hey, how am I supposed to react when listening to this story? It's not funny at all..."

LABEL: 0xA6D7
STRING: I said it.

LABEL: 0xA714
STRING: For the first time, I expressed my opinion to my mother.

LABEL: 0xA757
STRING: I owe you for raising me as a single mother, so I've never said a word about it, but I'm at my... limit.

LABEL: 0xA7E8
STRING: Saika

LABEL: 0xA7F6
STRING: I don't want to think about it... but the reason you divorced our father was because of your affair with that guy?

LABEL: 0xA87C
STRING: I don't know what happened between them because I was just a little girl back then. They never told me why they broke up.

LABEL: 0xA90B
STRING: I don't know if my suspicion is true or not. But...

LABEL: 0xA960
STRING: When I heard my mother's story, I couldn't help but imagine it.

LABEL: 0xA9C3
STRING: Mom

LABEL: 0xAA13
STRING: My mother was silent.

LABEL: 0xAA4E
STRING: Can I take this silence as an admission?

LABEL: 0xAAB7
STRING: Mom

LABEL: 0xAAC9
STRING: "...So what? Get off my case! Stop talking back to me!"

LABEL: 0xAB36
STRING: Saika

LABEL: 0xAB44
STRING: "Stop being so defiant like that. ...It's not right."

LABEL: 0xABBB
STRING: Saika

LABEL: 0xABC9
STRING: "I want you to reflect on your actions... I feel sorry for my father."

LABEL: 0xAC3A
STRING: Mom

LABEL: 0xAC4C
STRING: "But actually, all you're doing is being a contrarian, aren't you〜?"

LABEL: 0xACB7
STRING: Saika

LABEL: 0xACC5
STRING: "I think you should be a little more ashamed that you two had an illicit affair."

LABEL: 0xAD49
STRING: Mother was silent.

LABEL: 0xAD82
STRING: I'm starting to see more and more things I don't like about her, or rather, she's stepping on landmines herself.

LABEL: 0xADF9
STRING: I was so shocked that I couldn't even find the words.

LABEL: 0xAE44
STRING: I thought the foundations of this family were rotting away.

LABEL: 0xAEA7
STRING: Mom

LABEL: 0xAEB9
STRING: "Don't say that, Saika-chan!! You can't deny your mother her right to love!"

LABEL: 0xAF43
STRING: She stood up abruptly and made her way to the kitchen.

LABEL: 0xAF9A
STRING: After a pause for breath, my mother reappeared with a knife in her hand.

LABEL: 0xB04F
STRING: As my legs were trembling and unable to move, she stabbed as hard as she could.

LABEL: 0xB0C2
STRING: Mom

LABEL: 0xB0D4
STRING: "Mother doesn't have anyone else but you!"

LABEL: 0xB12E
STRING: Yes, my mother is proud of only one thing, that is, my existence...

LABEL: 0xB1A1
STRING: I'm connected to such amazing people like celebrities, so I must be amazing as well, right?

LABEL: 0xB22A
STRING: As a poor person who has nothing of her own to be proud of, she had no choice but to boast about the people around her.

LABEL: 0xB29F
STRING: She's just bragging about her daughter and making herself feel important, even though she's done nothing to deserve it.

LABEL: 0xB336
STRING: Mom

LABEL: 0xB348
STRING: "Saika-chan, you were mother's hope!"

LABEL: 0xB3A8
STRING: She pulled out the knife and a lot of blood spurts out of my chest.

LABEL: 0xB407
STRING: Then she plunged it straight into my throat.

LABEL: 0xB474
STRING: Mom

LABEL: 0xB486
STRING: "Stop denying your mother!!!!"

LABEL: 0xB4DC
STRING: For the sake of such trivial pride, the thing I've been protecting all these years was defiled.

LABEL: 0xB54F
STRING: My mother was the one who has always denied me the opportunity to be a beautician.

LABEL: 0xB5B2
STRING: When I was a little girl, if I told her about my dreams, she would always reply thus.

LABEL: 0xB615
STRING: ─"You should get a real job instead of something so foolish."

LABEL: 0xB680
STRING: How could someone who once denied the dreams of others like that, brag about it to everyone around her?

LABEL: 0xB6E9
STRING: No matter how you look at it, it's not the right thing for someone who tried to crush your dreams to do.

LABEL: 0xB756
STRING: ...That's why my anger won't dissipate.

LABEL: 0xB7A9
STRING: The knife plunged into my throat and went through my neck.

LABEL: 0xB7FA
STRING: At that moment, my vision was cut off and I became aware of my impending death.

LABEL: 0xB84F
STRING: Goodbye, world.

LABEL: 0xB88E
STRING: ─I wonder what my little sister thought and felt when she saw our mother like this.

LABEL: 0xB903
STRING: I'm sure that since I left home...

LABEL: 0xB94E
STRING: Our mother must have talked about me all the time.

LABEL: 0xB99F
STRING: She was probably comparing my sister to me.

LABEL: 0xB9EC
STRING: I'm sorry I didn't get to do many proper big-sister-like things for her.

LABEL: 0xBA53
STRING: I wanted to know what she was going through.

LABEL: 0xBAB0
STRING: ...But since I'm no longer of this world, I have no way of knowing anymore.

LABEL: 0xBB99
STRING: ─If anyone saw such a tragic incident, would they find it in their heart to forgive?

LABEL: 0xBC0C
STRING: For a long, long time, I became a shell of my former self.

LABEL: 0xBC63
STRING: Time stopped for me, and I was still stuck in that day when Onee-chan died.

LABEL: 0xBCD6
STRING: Because I was watching her, closer than anyone else.

LABEL: 0xBD27
STRING: She worked hard, because she was different from me. She didn't let her dream stay just a dream.

LABEL: 0xBDA8
STRING: She worked very hard to make her dream come true.

LABEL: 0xBE03
STRING: She said she's going to make it happen, even if her mom denies it...

LABEL: 0xBE60
STRING: She even went to a vocational school in a distant city for it. For year after year...

LABEL: 0xBEC9
STRING: I loved... such an Onee-chan very much.

LABEL: 0xBF2A
STRING: So I was sad when Onee-chan was gone from my life.

LABEL: 0xBF89
STRING: I could not easily let her go.

LABEL: 0xBFEE
STRING: It became a daily routine for me to cut my own arm with the scissors that Onee-chan left behind.

LABEL: 0xC055
STRING: And my mom doesn't care about me, so she doesn't think anything of it when I do this.

LABEL: 0xC0C2
STRING: But I didn't think this was something bad.

LABEL: 0xC115
STRING: Because when I did this, I felt like Onee-chan was there for me.

LABEL: 0xC180
STRING: I felt like Onee-chan was right next to me, together... whispering to me.

LABEL: 0xC1F9
STRING: Only when I was doing this could I feel Onee-chan's presence.

LABEL: 0xC315
STRING: A few months have passed since Onee-chan died.

LABEL: 0xC36C
STRING: They didn't give me any details, all I know is that it was an accident.

LABEL: 0xC3E3
STRING: ─The most important person in my life has disappeared from this world.

LABEL: 0xC446
STRING: Spacing out in the changing room at my part-time job, my sister's face came into mind.

LABEL: 0xC4B3
STRING: "It's been a while since I've been back to my hometown, and I was looking forward to seeing you..."

LABEL: 0xC528
STRING: I wondered if she had an accident on her way back to our hometown. There's so much I don't know.

LABEL: 0xC597
STRING: Onee-chan...

LABEL: 0xC5D2
STRING: I want to meet you, Onee-chan.

LABEL: 0xC62B
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0xC639
STRING: "What's wrong, Saiko-chan? Why the long face?"

LABEL: 0xC6AA
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0xC6B8
STRING: "What's on your mind? If you don't mind, would you like to talk about it with me?"

LABEL: 0xC810
STRING: Saiko

LABEL: 0xC81E
STRING: "Onee...chan?"

LABEL: 0xC85F
STRING: I felt that Nana-senpai resembled my Onee-chan.

LABEL: 0xC8CC
STRING: Maybe... that's why I've devoted everything to her.

LABEL: 0xCC5D
STRING: HAPPY END「Substitute」

LABEL: 0xCC8F
STRING: Clear Password Part 6:「wer」
